quote: Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday. – Dale Carnegie
fact: During a severe windstorm or rainstorm the Empire State Building sways several feet to either side.
joke: I was so proud when I finished the puzzle in six months, when on the side it said three to four years.
